title: Alli Arjuna Lyrics Kaaviya Thalaivan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:  Alli Arjuna
Singer: Haricharan, Bela Shende
Lyrics: Vaali 
Movie: Kaaviya Thalaivan
Music: AR Rahman  

Vandhanam vandhanam 
vandhanam vandhanam
yellorukkum
thandhanam thandhanam

Kundhanam kundhanam
kundhanam kundhanam
idam pidikka
mundhanum mundhanum

Yaadhavanaam andha madhavanum
avan machunanaam andha arjunanum
yaathirai varugayile
theerththa yaathirai varugaiyile
naadu kadandhu kaadu kadandhu
madhuraikku vaaaraaga

Then madhuraikku vaaraanga
angu nadappadhu alli raajiyam
aththanai aangalum sutha poojiyam

alliyo pudhu rosa
paarthaar arjuna maharaasaa
alli malarula kallu viludhu
arjunan mugathula jollu valiyudhu
aarambam aagudhu naadaga kadhalu
aanukkum pennum nadakkura modhalu

Alli varugiraal alli varugiraal
azhagi aval perazhagi
Alli varugiraal alli varugiraal
azhagi aval perazhagi

Mugathazhagi aamaa mugathazhagi
maruthaani poosiya negathazhagi
kovil thoon pola thodaiyazhagi
komberi moookkan pola sadaiyazhagi

Ava nadakkura nadaya paarthu
thendral kaaththu
adha paaththu
udal verthhu udal thorthu
alli varugiraalae.

Alli varugiraal alli varugiraal
azhagi aval perazhagi

Priysagiye piriyasagiye
mazhai naalaa idhu mazhai naalaa
mayilinam thogai virippadhenna
adhu mohana naadagam nadippadhenna
mohana naadagam nadippadhenna

Nalla sagunaa 
idhu nalla sagunaa.
oru naayagam vara koodum
unga vaai velukka
iru vizhi sivakka
kaadhal noi thannai tharakkoodum.

Yaaradi avan yaaradi
veeraadhi veeraneo kooradi
sooraadhi soorano kooradi
indha alliyayai jaadhi malliyai
inba valliyayai, uyir kolliyayai
vellathaan vandhavanaa
ezhu vanna migundhavanaa
yaaradi avan yaaradi .

Abaiyilirukkum aththanai perukkum
vanakkam vanakkam 
en vanakkathile en thamizh manakkum.

panja paandavar anju pergalae
naduvile naan pirandhaen
arjunan enbadhu en peyaru
aththinapuri thaan en ooru. 

Kannaa kannaa
yaen azhaithaai 
ennai yaen azhaithai
arjunanae en aaruyir thozha..

Madhuraiyayai aalgira alli
en manadhai eduthaale kalli
en ullathathai ottiya palli
avala odukkanum padukkayil pulli.

Indha samyathil ne udhavanum kannaa
engala serthu nee vaikanum onnaa
Naan Bamaavukkuthaanda Maama
Adha Nee Marakathey Aamaa
Unnai Vittal Ennakku Yaaru
Udhavi Seivaar Kooru

Naan Maargangal Solven Kelu
Mana Maalaiyai Thaangum Un Tholu

Naan Annathooviyil Alandhirukka
En Manikazhuthil
Thaali Kattalamaa Kattalamaa

En Mela Kuththam Illa
Unna Kanda Muthala
En Nenju Suthamilla
En Mela Kutham Illa
Unna Kanda Muthala
En Nenju Suthamilla

Nee Potathu Ethanai Vedamadaa
Kundhi Puthiranaai Vandhu Moodumada
Veeran Endraal Nee Villedu
Indha Poovaiyin Maele Nee Poarthodu

Nenju Porukkuthillaiye
Nenju Porukkuthillaiye
Naam Thaayaal Pirandhoam
Thamizhaal Valarndhoam

Thayum Tamizhum Pendhane
Irandum Irandu Kandhaane
Thayum Tamizhum Pendhane
Irandum Irandu Kandhaane

Parangiyarku
Bharatha Thaaithaan Adimaiyaadha?
Aval Kaivilangalum
Kaal Vilangaalum Naalum Novadha?

Viduthalai Velviyil Koduthalai
Vellaiyum Seivano Suduthalai
Makkalukku Illai Soodu
Ithu Maaperum MaanakKedu
Enge Pogum Naadu
Ithu Yaam Irukkum Thaai Veedu
Nenju Porukkuthillaiye
Nenju Porukkuthillaiye

seo.description: Get the complete Alli Arjuna Lyrics Kaaviya Thalaivan Song Lyrics  from Kaaviya Thalaivan. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Bela Shende. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
